resources.string: 1- Participant in the auction shall bear responsibility to disclose information committed by him and that it does not include any mistake whatsoever its type.
2- The auctioneer must enter correct and accurate information related to the auction.

3- Participation in the auction be regarded as an acknowledgment by the bidder that he is ready to pay the complete amount in case of winning, and this within an extreme period of 20 working days and that in case of non-payment within this period, fining him the difference of the two prices according to the law, whereas he wasted the opportunity for another bidder and wasted completion of the deal.

4- Participant in the auction shall acknowledge the application of rules, terms, and conditions of the land department on all properties available that he reviewed, and he reviewed the same and informed about it by secure.
5- For bidding and services (low bid), the auctioneer must specify a period for the auction to end.
6- The winner details will be emailed to the seller once the auction time has ended. The seller must contact him within 48 hours of being notified.

7- All terms and conditions of the auction shall be considered as declared and served to all participants in the auction by SECURE E-AUCTION, whereas participant in the auction shall acknowledge that he reviewed all procedures related to the auction and that he shall have no right to object any disposal made by him during his participation in the auction.

"Secure E-Auction" is a program that focuses on securing auctions and low bids. It is currently only available in the UAE, but we are confident that it will be available elsewhere given the large turnout of bidders. There are a lot of online auctions available in the UAE but what distinguishes our application from others is the implementation of a lot number of security standards.

The electronic auction provides excellent security to protect our customers\' privacy to protect user data from any attacks. We also implemented a lot of testing to analyze the system under all potential scenarios and to ensure that our app can deal with many types of hacking.
